name: Spacin' Out (Daineffable)
description:
How to Play: Click to move left and right to dodge asteroids! If you have ammo click the asteroid to destroy it! The ship will wrap around from one side to the other. New ships and firing radicles in the store are purely for looks. Have fun and feedback is greatly appreciated!!!

Game Created using Construct 2 in my early stages of Developing games.  Just now decided to upload it here.
